value:
$WmMPID_カトリーヌ,ch17_34_Shamir_FF_Pair,Face|Ahhh. No patrols, no responsibilities...
Our only job today is to sit here and
stare out at the ocean.$k$p$nMPID_比翼シャミア|Yes. The sound of the waves is so
calming, I may just have to take
a nap...$k$p$WmMPID_水着カスパル,ch17_09_Casper_M_Swim21,Face|There they are! Catherine, Shamir!
You guys want to go for a dip?
I'll show you how fast I can swim!$k$p$WmMPID_水着レオニー,ch17_26_Leonie_F_Swim21,Face|I think Shamir would rather stay and
have me show her my new trick.$k$pI learned how to hit a moving crab
with my arrows. You've got to see it!$k$p$WmMPID_水着イングリット,ch17_19_Ingrid_F_Swim20,Face|Now that we've found you, Catherine,
would you mind leading me in some
beach combat drills?$k$p$WmMPID_水着ディミトリ,ch17_03_Dimitri_M_Swim22,Face|If you two are training, then I'd like to
participate as well.$k$p$WmMPID_水着ドロテア,ch17_11_Dorothea_F_Swim20,Face|Everyone, please, can't you see
we're interrupting? It's obvious that
they want to be alone...$k$p$WmMPID_双界エーデルガルト,ch17_02_Edelgardr_FF_Pair,Face|Is something the matter? Why is
everyone gathered over here?$k$p$WmMPID_水着ローレンツ,ch17_20_Lorenz_M_Swim20,Face|Having a little soiree, it would seem!
Naturally, it would be rude of me not
to show my face at such an event.$k$p$WmMPID_比翼シャミア,ch17_34_Shamir_FF_Pair,Face|Ugh, you're all so loud.$k$p$nMPID_カトリーヌ|Hey! This is a big beach. How about
you find yourselves another spot to
settle down?$k$pNo offense, but we were hoping for
some peace and quiet.$k$p$WmMPID_レア,ch17_01_Beleth_FF_Pair,Face|Indeed, I think we could do without
so much rowdiness.$k$p$WmMPID_カトリーヌ,ch17_34_Shamir_FF_Pair,Face|Oh, Lady Rhea! Welcome!$k$p$nMPID_比翼シャミア|...$k$p

$WmMPID_水着アッシュ,ch17_15_Ashe_M_Swim21,Face|Everyone have something to drink?
If you don't, say something and I'll
top you up!$k$p$WmMPID_水着メルセデス,ch17_17_Mercedes_F_Swim21,Face|Good food, good company, and a
pristine ocean. I can't think of a
better combination.$k$p$WmMPID_水着クロード,ch17_04_Claude_M_Swim22,Face|No argument here. Nothing beats a
feast on the beach!$k$p$WmMPID_比翼ヒルダ,ch17_25_Hilda_FF_Pair,Face|Aren't you gonna eat something,
Marianne? Here, let me put some
meat on your plate.$k$p$nMPID_マリアンヌ|Oh! Um, Hilda, I don't think I can eat
all that...$k$p$WmMPID_水着シルヴァン,ch17_16_Sylvain_M_Swim20,Face|Hey there, miss! You like food?
I'm throwing a little dinner party with
my friends, if you want to— OK, fair.$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_比翼シャミア,ch17_34_Shamir_FF_Pair,Face|$Fi1500|This has officially become a
school event.$k$p$nMPID_カトリーヌ|Yep. But they look happy, right?
Lady Rhea and the professor too.$k$p$nMPID_比翼シャミア|I thought we came here for a quiet
day at the beach together.$k$p$nMPID_カトリーヌ|I know. But look! All of the houses
sitting down together for a summer
banquet...$k$pYou gotta admit it warms your heart.$k$p$nMPID_比翼シャミア|Hmph. It doesn't make my heart
any colder.$k$p$nMPID_カトリーヌ|Attagirl! C'mon, let's get over there
and join in.$k$pGotta put some food on our plates
before it's all gone!$k$p
